name: Run Gunner
description:
You have a gun and can go ridiculously fast with enough skill. Shoot all the targets before the timer runs out. 

With no cap on how fast you can move, Master your use of momentum and precision aim to fly across maps 

Currently featuring: 

                Crazy physics that allow you to move however you can

                Eight Maps with multiple ways to traverse

                Ridiculously Amazing Breakcore soundtrack by Sethersson

                Weird cat dude as your player!

Check out the community here: https://discord.com/invite/dPptHmegA4 And/Or support me here!: https://ko-fi.com/softcicada
